document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">Light </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">sufficient </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">itself </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">If </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">others </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">want </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">see </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">It </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">can </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">had </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">on </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">Window </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70e498">panes </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Some </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">Hours </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Day </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70e498">Compensation </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">It </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">holds </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">large </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">Glow </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">Squirrel </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">Himmaleh </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">Precisely </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Light is sufficient to itself
